page.title: 05HOUSING SURVEY
page.content: We carried out a survey of 120 houses in our area.Most houses in our area were built between 1961-1970.28 houses were built between 1951 and 1960. Between 1931-1940 14 houses were built & from 1941-1950 13 were built. Before 1920 5 were built & between 1921 & 1930 2 houses were built. There were no houses built between 1980 & 1985. Most houses are semi-detached & few are terraced. 81% of the houses in our area have got 2 storeys, 18% have got 1 storey.Most people own their own houses.28% rent theirs from the council.Most houses have got 3 bedrooms,15% have got 2 and 17% have got 4 or more.Most houses use natural gas or electricity.Some use solid fuel,oil or calor gas.Nearly everyone has got a telephone. Most houses are made of brick,8% are made of stone,8% of other material.
